title: Chrysler Headquarters and Technology Center | The Center for Land Use Interpretation
snippet: The Chrysler Headquarters and Technology Center, in Auburn Hills, Michigan, north of Detroit, has 5,300,000 square feet, and a contiguous office complex with a central building that is half a mile long.
